certified.label: Certified Attributes
certified.description: Attributes recognized to members by an authoritative source.

verified.label: Verified Attributes
verified.description: Attributes recognized by the providers to the users following an investigation. Alternatively, PDND Interoperability offers the possibility for lenders to rely on the investigations carried out by other lenders, if available.

declared.label: Declared Attributes
declared.description: Attributes of which the user declares possession, acknowledging them under his own responsibility with a self-declaration.

noAttributesRequiredAlert: There are no {{attributeKey}} attributes required for this e-service
title: attribute {{num}}:

group.title: The user must possess at least one of the following requirements
group.canRequireVerification: For this attribute use the verification made by other providers
